name: Channel-Autopost
description: Autopost media group such as photo, video, audio, document

BOT_TOKEN.description: Create a bot from @BotFather and get the bot token.

CHANNEL_ID.description: Your channel id. Watch https://youtube.com/shorts/nFDUBIak6DI and paste your channel id here (where to post your media group files). don't forget to add your bot as administrator in your channel.

OWNER_ID.description: Your telegram id. go to @missrose_bot and type /id and paste your id here

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Your MongoDB URL. Watch https://youtu.be/0aYrJTfYBHU and paste your mongodb url here
